mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, remaining_draws, daily_draws, create_time, update_time, last_refresh_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{remainingDraws}, #{dailyDraws}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lastRefreshDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET remaining_draws = remaining_draws - 1, update_time = datetime('now', 'localtime') WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND remaining_draws > 0
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, remaining_draws, daily_draws, create_time, update_time, last_refresh_date FROM users WHERE date(last_refresh_date) < date(#{todayStart})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET remaining_draws = remaining_draws + daily_draws, update_time = #{refreshTime}, last_refresh_date = #{refreshTime} WHERE date(last_refresh_date) < date(#{refreshTime})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, remaining_draws, daily_draws, create_time, update_time, last_refresh_date FROM users ORDER BY create_time DESC
